products.description: This cotton fleece hoodie commemorates the Summer Olympic and Paralympic Games returning to the US in 2028. It features Western-inspired embroidery and prints that pay tribute to the year and location-Los Angeles California. The label at the pocket features the Olympic Rings and an "LA28" graphic inspired by the iconic Ralph Lauren P-Wing symbol from the '90s marking the first time in Olympic and Paralympic history where the Games emblem is reimagined by Ralph Lauren.

products.name: Badgley Mischka Strapless High-Slit Dress
products.brandedName: Badgley Mischka Strapless High-Slit Dress
products.description: Whoever said elegance can't be a little bit daring clearly hasn't laid eyes on Strapless High-Slit Dress. This number's a surefire head-turner, flaunting ruffles that tumble down in playful asymmetry and a thigh-high slit that's all about that bold strut. Wear this day into night. Made of buttery-smooth stretch scuba material, this dress has a bodice that fits like a dream before flowing into an A-line shape. It's nipped in just right at the waist with a chic belt, topped off with a neat square buckle. And let's talk about the drama: that ruffle detail makes a sweeping statement, and with a thigh-high slit that's all about the allure, you're set to stir up a little envy with every move you make.

products.name: Hyacinth House Magenta Multi Floral Ruffle Collar Louisa Maxi Dress
products.brandedName: Hyacinth House Magenta Multi Floral Ruffle Collar Louisa Maxi Dress
products.unbrandedName: Hyacinth House Magenta Multi Floral Ruffle Collar Louisa Maxi Dress
products.description: Hyacinth House represents classic femininity while edging on the side of flirty, bohemian, and playful. Through vibrant florals, textured ruffles, and bold patterns, the collection inspires women to embrace their romantic and whimsical side, seeking adventure, excitement, and celebration. One of our best-sellers in a new color, the Louisa Dress is a style we know you'll reach for time and time again. Perfect for resort-wear, brunches, showers, and anything in between, the ways to style this maxi are endless. Featuring a feminine ruffle collar with short puff sleeves, and an all-over ditsy floral print, this silhouette is easy to wear all day long. Pair with chunky heels and a sweater for a casual cool daytime look, or create a little contrast and pair with boots and a leather jacket for added edge. Ruffled stand collar Short puff sleeves Structured cuffs Button down front placket Side seam pockets Maxi length Lined Material: 100% Cotton (outer), 80% Polyester, 20% Cotton (lining) Care: Hand wash cold, hang to dry

products.name: Badgley Mischka Shimmering Strapless Gown
products.brandedName: Badgley Mischka Shimmering Strapless Gown
products.description: The Shimmering Strapless Gown is a love letter to the night sky, with shades that deepen as stunningly as the twilight hours. Its delicate texturing and rich blend of colors makes this gown naturally fitting for high-end parties, where its detailing and the understated elegance of its color palette are sure to be celebrated. The strapless design is paired with a pleated mesh bodice that snugly cinches at the waist, highlighting your natural curves. Just beneath the empire waistline, the skirt unfolds in a mesmerizing ombre effect, gorgeously flowing from lighter to deeper shades. With its fine pleats and a hint of sheerness, this piece beautifully unites texture and fluid movement.

products.name: Nakia Dress
products.brandedName: MISA Nakia Dress
products.description: Nakia Dress Nakia Dress Self & Lining: 95% polyester 5% spandex. Made in USA. Dry clean only. Fully lined. Back button closure with keyhole design. Mesh fabric with side slit. MISA-WD806. TINDL8989. Shadi Askari-Farhat, the designer behind Tbags Los Angeles, launched MISA in Spring 2016. A combination of her daughter's names, Milla and Sayeh, the label embodies the natural evolution of the designer with an elevated femininity and sophistication. Deeply inspired by her travels and love for global style, MISA is for the modern-day bohemian who spends her life travelling the world, leaping from one exotic location to another.

products.name: Mac Duggal Ruffled Floral Gown
products.brandedName: Mac Duggal Ruffled Floral Gown
products.description: About The Brand:Mac Duggal s remarkable legacy is defined by sophisticated design aesthetics featuring signature luxe fabrics and the rich, opulent hand-beading traditions of his native India. Over the years, Mac Duggal has become one of the most sought-after names in women s luxury apparel and evening wear. From couture one-of-a-kind styles fabricated for the red carpet, to cocktail dresses and gowns to mark special occasions and milestone moments - every Mac Duggal design is a timeless and ageless fashion statement.

products.name: KOJOOIN Women Chiffon Cardigan Open Front Ruffle Sleeve Shrug Lightweight Semi-Sheer Cropped Beach Cover Up,White - M
products.brandedName: KOJOOIN Women Chiffon Cardigan Open Front Ruffle Sleeve Shrug Lightweight Semi-Sheer Cropped Beach Cover Up,White - M
products.unbrandedName: KOJOOIN Women Chiffon Cardigan Open Front Ruffle Sleeve Shrug Lightweight Semi-Sheer Cropped Beach Cover Up,White - M
products.description: Add a layer of elegance to your wardrobe with our Women's Mesh Cardigan. This lightweight, open-front shrug features ruffle sleeves that offer a charming touch, making it perfect for layering over your favorite outfits. The semi-sheer fabric adds a hint of allure, allowing your look to shine through while keeping you comfortable in warmer weather. Crafted from a blend of 95% polyester and 5% spandex, this cropped cardigan provides a soft and breathable feel, making it the ideal cover-up for the beach, casual outings, or evening gatherings. Available in a variety of styles and colors, you can easily find the perfect match to complement your personal aesthetic. Whether you pair it with a sundress, tank top, or shorts, our Women's Mesh Cardigan is a versatile accessory that adds a touch of sophistication to any ensemble. Embrace effortless style and comfort with this essential piece!
